M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Chess
Creates a chess board for two players Accepts input from players at their turn through command line Checks the validity of the move through various conditions and shows an error message if the move is illegal game ends when any player resigns by typing 'resign' or offers a draw by typing 'draw?' or through a checkmate All the conditions of a chess game are implemented except stalemate, fifty move rule, threefold repetition and dead position
make() - Static method in class Chess
This method sets up the chess board with all the pieces at their default location
makeFalse(boolean[]) - Static method in class Chess
makes the elements of given array equal to false
move(int, int) - Method in class ChessPiece
